casebody.data:
No. 10-10390 (10A1084). Benny Joe Stevens, Petitioner v. Mississippi. 563 U.S. 984, 131 S. Ct. 2441,

179 L. Ed. 2d 1206,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3539. May 10, 2011.

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death, presented to Justice Scalia, and by him referred to the Court, denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Mississippi denied.
